But if you do it like that, the Anchor's `program` macro do not propagate the flag through the code it generates and then it says the instruction is missing
you need to registor the feature in your `Cargo.toml` and then use this `anchor build -- --features \"dev\"`

messages.content: well depends what you want to do, if you want to call it, or just their instructions... for the former, import the program as crate and use cpi, for the latter, copy-paste (https://github.com/project-serum/anchor/issues/454)

embeds.title: lang: Program composition · Issue #454 · project-serum/anchor
embeds.description: One should be able to compose programs together similar to traits or mixins to combine the behavior of different programs. For example, suppose you had the following two programs #[program] mod foo...
